venueName: Charleston Harbor Fish House - Southern Fare from the Land and Sea

pages.text: The Charleston Harbor Fish House Southern Fare from the Land and Sea We’re located conveniently on Patriots Point for easy access by land or sea. Serving South Carolina Coastal cuisine featuring dishes from the land and sea with local favorites like Shrimp & Grits, Surf and Turf and more. The views from the Fish House are like none other in Charleston; views of the historic Charleston skyline, the USS Yorktown and Marina from every table in the restaurant. The restaurant is divided into 3 distinct seating areas with the porch offering an Indoor/ Outdoor experience with custom surround garage doors, the main dining room offers a lively atmosphere with the bar and a brick fireplace and the Harbor Room is the smallest dining room ideal for parties or a more intimate experience. Come in the evening to view the most spectacular sunsets from the Bridge Bar, located on the rooftop of the Fish House for the unparalleled views. We are open daily from 7:00am to 9:00pm. Patrons are encouraged to make reservations for dinner. Parking is conveniently located in the lot adjacent to the restaurant and parking vouchers are validated with a meal purchase. You may also come by boat, please call the Charleston Harbor Marina at 843-284-7067 or hail us by VHF on Channel 16. Book a Reservation Online Menus Click a menu below to learn more. Breakfast Buffet Friday, Saturday, SUNDAY Adults $22.00 Per Person Children under 12 $11.00 Per Person Breakfast Served Daily 7:00 am – 10:30 am Waffle or French Toast Scrambled Eggs with Cheddar Cheese Bacon Sausage Breakfast Potatoes Toast, Pastries & Muffins Caprese Avocado Toast Brisket Hash Pancakes Pancake of the day (Varies Plain, Blueberry, Chocolate Chip) Grits Smoked Salmon Seasonal Fruit Yogurt & Granola A 20% gratuity and 3% service fee will be added to parties of 8 or more. To expedite service, no separate checks for parties of 8 or more. Menu subject to change at any time. Please call 843-284-7019 to have the most up to date menu emailed to you Your content goes here. Premium Sides Proud to Call the Lowcountry Home! A 20% gratuity and 3% service fee will be added to parties of 8 or more. To expedite service, no separate checks for parties of 8 or more. Menu subject to change at any time. Private Dining In addition to our fantastic views and fresh menu options, we have four (4) distinct areas available for large parties or private bookings for up to 150 people. Contact us today to check availability for hosting a corporate luncheon, business dinner, bridal luncheon, rehearsal dinner, reception, baby shower, or group happy hour. Click Here to Learn More For availability and additional information on hosting parties of 18 or more at the Fish House, you may contact our Sales Team at , via email at or by simply completing the inquiry form below. 843-284-7046 sales@charlestonharborresort.com We look forward to hosting your next event soon. Venue Descriptions Click each toggle to learn more. Yacht Club EXPERIENCE UNSURPASSED VIEWS The Yacht Club is the newest, most exclusive addition to the already existing 10,000 square feet of meeting space at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina. This 2,100 square foot event space is made almost completely of windows overlooking the Charleston Harbor Marina and picturesque Charleston skyline. In addition to a view like no other, the space features reclaimed wooden planks for the flooring to give that nautical feel while using recycled materials. The space has drop ceilings with stained wooden beams, audio visual connections and built-in sound system. Capacity: 175 Reception 120 Banquet 100 Classroom 180 Theater Square Feet: 2,100 Bridge Bar FRESH SEAFOOD. FRESH DRINKS. FRESH AIR. Enjoy the views from this beautiful open air bar on the Charleston Harbor overlooking the USS Yorktown and historic Charleston skyline. The only view of the entire Charleston skyline from Mt. Pleasant with 180 degree view of the Ravenel Bridge to downtown to the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy peaceful bliss with friends, family and loved ones in the friendliest city in the U.S. The Harbor Room This semi-private dining space off the main dining room in the Charleston Harbor Fish House. Existing seating can accommodate up to 44 people over looking the USS Yorktown out to the Ravenel Bridge with a beautiful sunset, should you time your gathering in the afternoon. Fish House Porch 1,350 square feet of separate dining space with climate control and large screen doors that can be opened seasonally to let the fresh harbor breeze flow through. Existing seating can accommodate up to 72 people and can be used for reception space for up to 100 people. Holiday Parties The Charleston Harbor Fish House is the perfect location for hosting holiday parties, end of year client events, or customer celebrations. With a variety of locations and options to fit all budgets, spaces do book quickly during the holiday season. Contact us today to confirm your Yuletide festivities at the premier waterfront location in Charleston. Large Party Inquiries Charleston Harbor Resort Sales Team sales@charlestonharborresort.com Inquiry Form Name Email Address Subject Message Submit ☆ ☆ ☆ ☆ ☆ “Made a last minute reservation with no problem. Had an amazing view at sunset. Our server Hannah was excellent and the food was fantastic! Highly recommend.” -Devin Morris, Google Reviews ☆ ☆ ☆ ☆ WOWZA! Absolutely stellar service by Tanniel and some of the best food I’ve had in Charleston. The view of the USS Yorktown and USS Laffey is a great perk! -Stimpy R., Google Reviews ☆ ☆ ☆ ☆ The food here is delicious! Such a wide variety. Highly recommend the cornbread skillet. The views of the harbor and the USS Yorktown are unbelievable as you dine. -Kristy A., Google Reviews Location, Hours and Contact PHONE 843-284-7019 EMAIL fishhouse@charlestonharborresort.com ADDRESS 32 Patriots Point RoadMount Pleasant, South Carolina 29464 HOURS Breakfast Hours: 7am- 10:30am Lunch Hours: 11:30am – 3pm* Dinner Hours: 4:30pm – 9pm Sunday – Thursday | 4:30pm – 10pm Friday & Saturday Reservations Strongly Recommended for Dinner *Limited menu from 3:00 PM to 4:30 PM SOCIAL MEDIA Follow Follow Follow Call for a Reservation Book a Reservation Online Please note: for special requests or specific times, we recommend calling us directly at 843-284-7019, as availability during peak times can be determined more accurately through phone reservations over online bookings through Open Table.

Private Dining In addition to our fantastic views and fresh menu options, we have four (4) distinct areas available for large parties or private bookings for up to 150 people. Venue Descriptions Click each toggle to learn more. Yacht Club EXPERIENCE UNSURPASSED VIEWS The Yacht Club is the newest, most exclusive addition to the already existing 10,000 square feet of meeting space at Charleston Harbor Resort & Marina. This 2,100 square foot event space is made almost completely of windows overlooking the Charleston Harbor Marina and picturesque Charleston skyline. In addition to a view like no other, the space features reclaimed wooden planks for the flooring to give that nautical feel while using recycled materials. The space has drop ceilings with stained wooden beams, audio visual connections and built-in sound system. Capacity: 175 Reception 120 Banquet 100 Classroom 180 Theater Square Feet: 2,100 Bridge Bar FRESH SEAFOOD. FRESH DRINKS. FRESH AIR. Enjoy the views from this beautiful open air bar on the Charleston Harbor overlooking the USS Yorktown and historic Charleston skyline. The only view of the entire Charleston skyline from Mt. Pleasant with 180 degree view of the Ravenel Bridge to downtown to the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy peaceful bliss with friends, family and loved ones in the friendliest city in the U.S. The Harbor Room This semi-private dining space off the main dining room in the Charleston Harbor Fish House. Existing seating can accommodate up to 44 people over looking the USS Yorktown out to the Ravenel Bridge with a beautiful sunset, should you time your gathering in the afternoon. Fish House Porch 1,350 square feet of separate dining space with climate control and large screen doors that can be opened seasonally to let the fresh harbor breeze flow through. Existing seating can accommodate up to 72 people and can be used for reception space for up to 100 people. Holiday Parties The Charleston Harbor Fish House is the perfect location for hosting holiday parties, end of year client events, or customer celebrations. With a variety of locations and options to fit all budgets, spaces do book quickly during the holiday season. Contact us today to confirm your Yuletide festivities at the premier waterfront location in Charleston.
